programme.title: Women's Gold Medal Match CAN vs USA - Ice Hockey | Olympic Winter Games Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This event took place on 17/02/2022 at the Wukesong Sports Centre. Final Score: CAN 3:2 USA.

programme.title: CAN v GER (Semifinal) - Men's Ice Hockey | PyeongChang 2018 Replays
programme.desc: This Semifinal game was held at the Gangneung Hockey Centre on 23 February 2018.

programme.title: CZE v CAN (Bronze Medal Game) - Men's Ice Hockey | PyeongChang 2018 Replays
programme.desc: The Bronze Medal Match was held at the Gangneung Hockey Centre on 24 February 2018.

programme.title: SWE v CAN | Men's Ice Hockey Gold Match and Ceremony | Sochi 2014 Replays
programme.desc: Canada defended their Olympic title with a dominant 3-0 victory over Sweden. Jonathan Toews, Sidney Crosby, and Chris Kunitz each scored, while Carey Price recorded a flawless shutout. With airtight defense and elite NHL talent, Canada secured back-to-back Olympic gold medals, cementing their status as the world’s best.

programme.title: Men's Ice Hockey Final | Vancouver 2010 | Great Winter Olympic Moments
programme.desc: Join us for one of the greatest Winter Olympic Moments from the Vancouver Winter Olympic Games and watch as Canada defeats the USA in the Men's Ice Hockey Final and claims the gold medal.

programme.title: Beijing 2022 - Curling - Men's Finals Curling - Men's Finals
programme.desc: Don't miss the best Men's Curling moments from Beijing 2022.

programme.title: Beijing 2022 - Curling - Men's Round Robin
programme.desc: Don't miss the best Men's Curling moments from Beijing 2022.

programme.title: Vancouver 2010 Historical Flashback: Curling Men
programme.desc: Enjoy the action of Men's Curling from Vancouver 2010

programme.title: A Brilliant Curling Story | Five Rings Films
programme.desc: Led by skip Rhona Martin, five unassuming women from Scotland unite for a shot at Olympic curling glory – and end up capturing the hearts of a nation in the process.

programme.title: KOR v SWE (Gold Medal Game) - Women's Curling | PyeongChang 2018 Replays
programme.desc: This Gold Medal game was held Gangneung Curling Centre on 25 February 2018

programme.title: Men's Bronze Medal Match SWE vs SVK - Ice Hockey | Olympic Winter Games Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This event took place on 19/02/2022 at the National Indoor Stadium. Final Score: SVK 4:0 SWE. Slovakia claimed the bronze medal.

programme.title: Mixed Doubles Bronze Medal Match SWE vs GBR - Curling | Olympic Winter Games Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This event took place on 08/02/2022 at the Nat. Aquatics Ctr - Sheet B. Oskar Eriksson and Almida de Val (SWE) won the match and took home Bronze while Jennifer Dodds and Bruce Mouat (GBR) ended up in the 4th place.

programme.title: Mixed Doubles Gold Medal Match ITA vs NOR - Curling | Olympic Winter Games Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This event took place on 08/02/2022 at the Nat. Aquatics Ctr - Sheet B. Final Score: ITA 8:5 NOR. Italy won the final and took home Gold, Norway Silver and Sweden completed the podium.

programme.title: A Brilliant Curling Story | Five Rings Films
programme.desc: Led by skip Rhona Martin, five unassuming women from Scotland unite for a shot at Olympic curling glory – and end up capturing the hearts of a nation in the process.

programme.title: SWE v CAN | Men's Ice Hockey Gold Match and Ceremony | Sochi 2014 Replays
programme.desc: Canada defended their Olympic title with a dominant 3-0 victory over Sweden. Jonathan Toews, Sidney Crosby, and Chris Kunitz each scored, while Carey Price recorded a flawless shutout. With airtight defense and elite NHL talent, Canada secured back-to-back Olympic gold medals, cementing their status as the world’s best.

programme.title: CZE v CAN (Bronze Medal Game) - Men's Ice Hockey | PyeongChang 2018 Replays
programme.desc: The Bronze Medal Match was held at the Gangneung Hockey Centre on 24 February 2018.

programme.title: Competition Season Officially Begins | On Edge
programme.desc: It’s 4 months until Beijing 2022. Four of the teams arrive to Helsinki, Finland, for their first big competition of the season. Olivia and Adrian come face to face with the other Spanish team fighting for the same Olympic spot. Guillaume talks about his coming out story. Madison and Evan are eager to try their brand-new program. Filmed in the last six months leading up to Beijing 2022, On Edge is the Olympic Channel’s first weekly figure skating reality docuseries featuring athletes Madison Chock and Evan Bates (USA), Gabriella Papadakis and Guillaume Cizeron (FRA), Madison Hubbell and Zach Donohue (USA), Olivia Smart and Adrian Diaz (ESP), Laurence Fournier-Beaudry and Nikolaj Sorensen (CAN), Lilah Fear and Lewis Gibson (GBR), and coaches Marie-France Dubreuil and Patrice Lauzon, Romain Haguenauer and three time Olympic Gold medallist Scott Moir.

programme.title: A Great Start to the Season | On Edge
programme.desc:
It’s the teams’ first chance of the season to try their brand-new ice dancing programs in competition and in front of a live audience. Olivia and Adrian have a decisive performance for their Olympic qualification. Gabriella and Guillaume compete for the first time in 20 months. Madison and Evan get to see how the crowd react to try their new program. Lilah and Lewis are in for a great start.
Filmed in the last six months leading up to Beijing 2022, On Edge is the Olympic Channel’s first weekly figure skating reality docuseries featuring athletes Madison Chock and Evan Bates (USA), Gabriella Papadakis and Guillaume Cizeron (FRA), Madison Hubbell and Zach Donohue (USA), Olivia Smart and Adrian Diaz (ESP), Laurence Fournier-Beaudry and Nikolaj Sorensen (CAN), Lilah Fear and Lewis Gibson (GBR), and coaches Marie-France Dubreuil and Patrice Lauzon, Romain Haguenauer and three time Olympic Gold medallist Scott Moir.

programme.title: From Helsinki to Vegas | On Edge
programme.desc:
Back from Finland, the teams are prepping for the beginning of the ice dancing Grand Prix season. Four of the teams compete in Skate America 2021 in Vegas, where Madi and Zach defend their title, and Madi and Evan try to go for the win. Lilah and Guillaume talk about the homophobic remarks that came out of Finland.
Filmed in the last six months leading up to Beijing 2022, On Edge is the Olympic Channel’s first weekly figure skating reality docuseries featuring athletes Madison Chock and Evan Bates (USA), Gabriella Papadakis and Guillaume Cizeron (FRA), Madison Hubbell and Zach Donohue (USA), Olivia Smart and Adrian Diaz (ESP), Laurence Fournier-Beaudry and Nikolaj Sorensen (CAN), Lilah Fear and Lewis Gibson (GBR), and coaches Marie-France Dubreuil and Patrice Lauzon, Romain Haguenauer and three time Olympic Gold medallist Scott Moir.

programme.title: The Top Teams Face Off in Torino | On Edge
programme.desc:
Coach Marie-France Dubreuil’s two top teams arrive in Torino for the Italian Grand Prix 2021: Madison and Zach, and Grabriella and Guillaume. Both coming from fresh wins at Skate America and Finlandia Trophy, this is the first time they compete against each other in this season 2021-2022 season.
Filmed in the last six months leading up to Beijing 2022, On Edge is the Olympic Channel’s first weekly figure skating reality docuseries featuring athletes Madison Chock and Evan Bates (USA), Gabriella Papadakis and Guillaume Cizeron (FRA), Madison Hubbell and Zach Donohue (USA), Olivia Smart and Adrian Diaz (ESP), Laurence Fournier-Beaudry and Nikolaj Sorensen (CAN), Lilah Fear and Lewis Gibson (GBR), and coaches Marie-France Dubreuil and Patrice Lauzon, Romain Haguenauer and three time Olympic Gold medallist Scott Moir.

programme.title: Mixed Doubles Bronze Medal Match SWE vs GBR - Curling | Olympic Winter Games Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This event took place on 08/02/2022 at the Nat. Aquatics Ctr - Sheet B. Oskar Eriksson and Almida de Val (SWE) won the match and took home Bronze while Jennifer Dodds and Bruce Mouat (GBR) ended up in the 4th place.

programme.title: Mixed Doubles Gold Medal Match ITA vs NOR - Curling | Olympic Winter Games Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This event took place on 08/02/2022 at the Nat. Aquatics Ctr - Sheet B. Final Score: ITA 8:5 NOR. Italy won the final and took home Gold, Norway Silver and Sweden completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's Singles Heats 3 & 4 - Luge | Olympic Winter Games Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This event took place on 08/02/2022 at the Yanqing Sliding Centre. Olympic champion Natalie Geisenberger (GER) won her fifth Olympic Gold medal with a best time of 3:53.454. Anna Berreiter (GER) picked up her first Olympic medal with Silver and Tatyana Ivanova (ROC) took the Bronze.

programme.title: The in-line roller Champion ready to make Olympic History | Winter Tracks
programme.desc: Erin Jackson shook the speed skating world in 2017 by qualifying for PyeongChang 2018, only four months after she first stepped foot on ice. She was the first black woman to compete for the U.S. Olympic long track speed skating team. Supported by family and friends, she is now ready to take gold at next Olympic Winter Games.

programme.title: The sixth and final winter Olympics for India's luge legend
programme.desc: The inspiring full story of India's Shiva Keshavan, showcasing his training, qualification, and participation in PyeongChang 2018.

programme.title: China’s Yang Yang | Legends Live On
programme.desc: The first-ever gold medallist for China at the Olympic Winter Games, Yang Yang, is now helping others fulfil their dreams by mentoring young athletes.

programme.title: Wrapping Up the Grand Prix Season | On Edge
programme.desc:
With the sixth and final Grand Prix completed, coach Marie-France Dubreuil reflects on what each of the teams have achieved so far. Zach is curious about Madison and Adrian’s wedding plans. Gabriella makes an intriguing prediction about the Beijing 2022 Winter Olympics podium.
Filmed in the last six months leading up to Beijing 2022, On Edge is the Olympic Channel’s first weekly figure skating reality docuseries featuring athletes Madison Chock and Evan Bates (USA), Gabriella Papadakis and Guillaume Cizeron (FRA), Madison Hubbell and Zach Donohue (USA), Olivia Smart and Adrian Diaz (ESP), Laurence Fournier-Beaudry and Nikolaj Sorensen (CAN), Lilah Fear and Lewis Gibson (GBR), and coaches Marie-France Dubreuil and Patrice Lauzon, Romain Haguenauer and three time Olympic Gold medallist Scott Moir.

programme.title: Women's & Men's PGS Finals - Snowboard | Olympic Winter Games Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This event took place on 08/02/2022 at the Genting Snow Park - P & X. In the Women´s competition Ester Ledecka (CZE) claimed Gold, Daniela Ulbing (AUT) Silver and Gloria Kotnik (SLO) completed the podium. In the Men´s, Benjamin Karl (AUT) took home the Gold, Tim Mastnak (SLO) the Silver and Victor Wild (ROC) the Bronze.

programme.title: Women's & Men's Sprint Free - Qualification & Finals - Cross-Country Skiing | Olympic Winter Games Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This event took place on 08/02/2022 at the Zhangjiakou Crs-Ctry Ctr. At the Women´s event, Jonna Sundling (SWE) won the Gold with a best time of 3:09.68. Maja Dahlqvist (SWE) claimed Silver in 3:12.56 and Jessie Diggins (USA) came shortly in 3:12.84 earning a well-deserved Bronze. Johannes Høsflot Klæbo (NOR) successfully defended his Olympic title at the Men’s Sprint Free, wining the Gold Medal with a best time of 2:58.06. Federico Pellegrino (ITA) took the Silver, while Alexander Terentev (ROC) earned his first Olympic medal with Bronze.

programme.title: Men's Super-G - Alpine Skiing | Olympic Winter Games Beijing 2022
programme.desc: This event took place on 08/02/2022 at the Nat Alpine Ski Ctr - Speed Matthias Mayer (AUT) claimed historic Gold, Ryan Cochran-Siegle (USA) Silver and Aleksander Kilde (NOR) completed the podium.
